n=int(input())
ans=0
for i in range(n):
    a,b=map(int,input().split())
    if b-a>=2: ans+=1
print(ans)

n = int(input())
ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    p,q = map(int,input().split())
    if q-p>=2:
        ans+=1

print(ans)

n = int(input())
res = 0
for _ in range(n):
	p, q = map(int, input().split())
	if(q-p>=2):
		res+=1
print(res)

n = int(input())
ans = 0
for i in range(n):
	p, q = list(map(int, input().split()))
	ans += (q - p) >= 2
print(ans)

n = int(input())
cnt = 0
for i in range(0, n):
    p, q = input().split(" ")
    if int(q) - int(p) >= 2:
        cnt += 1
print (cnt)

m=0
n=int(input())
while(n):
    p,q=list(map(int,input().split(" ")))
    if(q-p>=2):
        m+=1
    n-=1
print(m)

n=int(input())
rez=0
for i in range(n):
    a,b=list(map(int,input().split()))
    if(b-a)>=2:
        rez+=1
print(rez)

__author__ = 'sonerik'

import sys

inp = sys.stdin
# inp = open("input.txt")

n = int(inp.readline())

free = 0

for line in inp:
    p, q = map(int, line.strip().split())
    if q - p >= 2:
        free += 1

print(free)

n = int(input())
val = 0
for i in range(n):
    p, q = (int(x) for x in input().split())
    if q - p >= 2:
        val += 1
print(val)

n = int(input())
cnt = 0
for i in range(n):
    p, q = map(int, input().split())
    if p <= q - 2:
        cnt += 1
print(cnt)
print(sum((lambda x: x[0] + 2 <= x[1])(list(map(int, input().split()))) for x in range(int(input()))))

n = int(input())
count = 0
for i in range(n):
	line = [int(j) for j in input().split()]
	if line[1] - line[0] > 1:
		count += 1
print(count)

n = int(input())
i = 0
true = 0
while i<n:
    a,b=list(map(int,input().split()))
    c = b-a
    if c>=2:
        true+=1
    i+=1
print(true)

n = int(input())
count = 0
for i in range(n):
    p, q = map(int, input().split())
    if q - p >= 2:
        count += 1
print(count)

n = int(input())
s, p, q = 0, [0] * n, [0] * n
for i in range(n):
    p[i], q[i] = [int(x) for x in input(). split()]
    if q[i] - p[i] > 1:
        s += 1
print(s)
